MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG10 postcode area of Moffat, affecting properties in Barnhill Mews and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:30pm due to a fault on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:45pm on Monday, 25 January 2021
